text: The 2021 BWF World Championships is a badminton tournament which will be held from 29 November to 5 December 2021 at Palacio de los Deportes Carolina Marín in Huelva, Spain. ==Host city selection== Huelva was awarded the event in November 2018 during the announcement of 18 major badminton event hosts from 2019 to 2025. ==References== Category:BWF World Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by Spain Category:Badminton tournaments in Spain Category:Sport in Huelva BWF World Championships BWF World
title: 2021 BWF World Championships
